attributes.action: exclude medical records from the upcoming data sharing bill.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition if you don't want your medical records available to assorted government departments,insurance companies or anyone else unconnected to the NHS,without your express consent.Thankyou.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
